name: Existential Speedway
description:
You drive a car around and around.

How many laps are enough?
Is there a way to escape the routine?

CONTROLS:
ASWD, or arrow keys, or left pad on a controller
Press escape to reset the game

Music: Dj Rostej - Serenity
https://www.jamendo.com/track/1073220/dj-rostej-serenity
